experiencie.title: Experience
experiencie.text: We have a team with more than 10 years of experience in the digital world. We are the link between content creators and brands, always looking for effective solutions adapted to each particular situation.

community.title: Community
community.text: We work with a wide variety of influencers and media figures on different platforms and social networks. Through the situation study of each case, we provide a specific service to meet the needs of the campaigns to be carried out.

results.title: Results
results.text: By making agreements under certain objectives, the returns from Influence marketing strategies are simply measurable and verifiable in the short term, so each brand can verify the effectiveness and efficiency of our collaborative work.

values.title: Values
values.text: We believe in transparency in all our interactions, we value creativity and innovation in everything we do. We believe in the power of community content generation and teamwork.

aboutUs.title: ABOUT US
aboutUs.text: At Influencia we are dedicated to promoting collaboration between influencers and brands to boost sales, optimize campaigns and achieve growth for both. With more than 400 profiles, our platform has become the meeting point for content creators and companies.

typeWritter.text2: We connect with your digital community
